structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
State Superintendent Of Buildings, And State House

law.catch_line: Selected Writings Of John Adams; Exhibition In State House
law.text: The superintendent shall set apart and maintain a suitable area located in Doric Hall in the state house for the use of the Massachusetts Historical Commission, such area to be under the charge of said Commission, subject to this section. The area thus set apart shall be used for exhibiting, under the direction of the editor-in-chief of the Adams Papers, selected writings of John Adams.
